author: KarolWes
title: Proper micro B-wing
review:
This set is an addition to August issue of LEGO Star Wars Magazine (08/19)

Model

As in title model is pretty accurate version of B-wing that can be seen in Return of the Jedi. It has folding wings, just like it should, overall shaping is also quite precise. Canopy part looks a bit off the place, too big and in wrong shape, but it will be hard to make it better. Center part is very smooth due to cut curved bricks. Gun made of lever is great, as well as famous orange signs made of studs (but round tile would be better). Four engines build of studs also works nice.

Construction is quite interesting, because lower part of center section is attached upside-down and is hold on place by plate and slope mounted on brackets. And it can stand on its own!

Parts

The most valuable for me are two pairs of mentioned cut curved bricks. There are also pair of wings 2x3, two astromech heads, two tiles 2x3 and globe in gray.

Summary

  • Proper version of classic ship.
  • Great parts.
  • Nice building technic.
  • Price accurate to real value of the set.
